Upcoming Events

Sometimes we even throw parties.



Nomad Girls Lunch

Nomad girls lunch in a chance for the nomad women of Chiang Mai to get together, have a nice chat, and maybe even spring a business idea off one another. If you are just passing through or have made Chiang Mai your home, Nomad Girls lunch welcomes you each Wednesday. For more information check out the Nomad Girls Facebook Group.

Wednesdays @ 12pm
